scripts.js-watch: onchange js/*.js index.html -- npm run copy
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run sass-watch" "npm run js-watch" "npm run server"
scripts.copy: mkdir -p build/js && cat vendor/angular.min.js js/*.js > build/js/app.js && cp index.html build
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run build-css
